text: Alikafiki na ixesha kwabo bakholwayo lokuba iintliziyo zabo zibe nokuzithoba, zizinikele kwinkumbulo ka-Allâh noko kwehlayo kuyinyaniso (i’Kur’ân)? IsiBhalo ngaphambili, kwaza kwathi kwakugqitha ithuba elide kubo iintliziyo zabo (zaqaqadeka) zaba lukhuni, ukanti uninzi lwabo bayadelela, abanantobeko
